name: Cranberry Chicken
ingredients: 1 can cranberry sauce (with or without berries)
1 bottle catalina or french salad dressing
instructions: Stir onion soup mix, cranberry sauce, and salad dressing together
Place chicken in a large baking dish and pour other ingredients on top.
Bake at 350 for about an hour, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
source: Friendly lady in the temple cafeteria
